name: The bloodstone ring of punishment
data: It increases the users constitution a bit.
It has excellent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoints pitifully.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users psionic resistance a bit.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'system shock'.
It increases the users cold resistance a bit.
It increases the users fire resistance a bit.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'ignore pain'.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance a bit.
